segments.text: Excuse me , could you please show me the way to the human resource department ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , but have you made an appointment ahead ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , of course . I am Monica . I have made an appointment with your HR manager .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just a minute please . I ’ ll make a call to the HR office .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , they confirm your appointment . Please come in . It is on the 3rd floor , room 3106 . You can take the right elevator as the left on is in maintenance today .
segments.speaker: S1
